content.raw: BTW, there's an ```undefined name``` error in line 646 of ```cloudsimd.py```, not introduced by this branch though, but which prevents ```cloudsimd.py``` from starting the daemon. I fixed the rest of the ```pyflakes``` errors in another branch osrf/cleanup-pyflakes and created a pull request for it to be merged (pull request #125).
content.html: BTW, there's an undefined name error in line 646 of cloudsimd.py, not introduced by this branch though, but which prevents cloudsimd.py from starting the daemon. I fixed the rest of the pyflakes errors in another branch osrf/cleanup-pyflakes and created a pull request for it to be merged (pull request #125).
